body.p: The Format and Indent Files script (batchFormatAndIndent.bat/batchFormatAndIndent.sh) can be used to format and indent many files at once.

section.title: Arguments for the Format and Indent Files Script

dlentry.dd: A filter for the input files, specified by using a file pattern (e.g. *.xml, t_*.dita).

A file containing formatting settings. Can be a .xpr file containing project options or a .xml file containing global options. If not specified, the operation runs with the application default settings.
Specify this argument if the operation should be performed recursively for the specified input directories.
Specify this argument to also format and indent hidden files.
Specify this argument to activate verbose logging.
